name: EthPriceOracle
description: A simple DeFi dapp that gives the users the ability to withdraw ETH worth a certain amount of USD, using Binance API & Oracles.

scripts.deploy:oracle: cd oracle && npx truffle migrate --network extdev --reset -all && cd ..
scripts.deploy:caller: cd caller && npx truffle migrate --network extdev --reset -all && cd ..
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:oracle && npm run deploy:caller
